name: The Harvest (itch) (Donovan Greene)
description:
Help the plants make it to the next harvest by collecting enough seeds! Use full-screen for the best experience.

- For 48 Hour 2023 Global Game Jam

Controls:

Collect Seed  - Left Click

Break Ice - f

Credits:

Programming - Donovan Greene (KingSlme)

Art - Brian Januario

Music/SFX - Alara Bread
